service.name: fetchInvoiceAttributes
service.description: Fetch appropriate invoice attributes based related order

service.name: fsdCreateInvoiceNote
service.description: Create a note item and associate with a Invoice

service.name: copyOrderNotesToInvoice
service.description: Copy Order Notes to Invoice

service.name: setInvoiceDueDate
service.description: Sets the invoice due date using terms if not set.

service.name: fetchQuoteAttributes
service.description: Retrieves the records from QuoteAttribute entity based on quoteId.

service.name: getFinanceReport
service.description:
// Added on 05 APRIL 2017 Inputs: Gets finance report for the given 14 search parameters (IN attributes).
Output: It returns a list of reports. Each report is a map. For each quote, the following information is provided as a map: 1. quoteId 2. partyId 3. quoteCurrencyUomId 4. partyDetails: a. partyId b. name c. email d. addressMap addressMap contains: i. toName ii. ttnName iii.address1 iv. address2 v. directions vi. city vii. postalCode viii. countryGeoId ix. stateProvinceGeoId e. telecomMap telecomMap contains: i. countryCode ii. areaCode iii. contactNumber iv. askForName 5. reqTakerDetails 6. supplierDetails 7. supplierPOCDetails 8. contractingOfficerDetails 9. orderClerkDetails 10. shipmentClerkDetails 11. mainSalesRepDetails 12. salesRepDetails The above items 5 to 12 are each list of details of all contacts (similar to 4. partyDetails, but lists allowing multiple values) 13. salesOrders This is a list of maps, each containing: a. salesOrderId b. invoicePerShipment c. obligationNumber d. purchaseOrderNumber e. requisitionPurchaseRequestNumber f. salesInvoices This is a list of salesInvoices, each is a map containing: i. salesInvoiceId ii. salesInvoiceAmount (BigDecimal) iii. paymentDate (Timestamp0 iv. purchasingEntityId v. receivedDate (Timestamp) vi. salesInvoiceStatusId vii. salesInvoiceDate (Timestamp) d. purchaseOrders This is a list of maps, each containing: i. purchaseOrderId ii. awardDate iii. purchaseInvoices This is a list of maps, each with: A. purchaseInvoiceId B. purchaseInvoiceAmount (BigDecimal) C. shipOrInstallDate (Timestamp) D. purchaseInvoiceDate (Timestamp) E. purchaseInvoiceStatusId e. loans This is a list of maps, each with: i. lenderPartyId ii. loanAmount (BigDecimal) iii. loanDueDate (Timestamp) iv. loanNotes 14. billToDetails 15. shipToDetails The above two are similar to 4 to 11 giving bill to and ship to customer(s) 16. notes 17. quoteContents 18. signed1449 (map containing repPartyId, senrDate (Timestamp), checkSigned)
